Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2008 03:36PM pattyinarnold wrote: I had my bi-mass in may of 2007 and had to remove the implants in june due to a steph infection.I had rads with the first bc in 2005 on the left side.  It took 5 sugeries and a wound fac for two weeks to get the skin to finally heal.  I want to try recon again and that is my fear that the wound won't heal,   but I am going to try again anyway,,,,maybe I'm  nuts! pattyinarnold
Posts.Title: incision won't close after mastectomy and implant grrlcancer macb04

Posts.Content: Sep 2, 2008 01:11PM pattyinarnold wrote: klfh, Welcome to the life line for bc survivors. You have come to the right place to get help on the bc journey you are starting on.  There is a thread for almost every question you my have and if there isn't start one.  We all love a new topic. I have learned so much in the month I have been on line.  Now I am hooked.  I go up and survey the boards just to see what is new.  So jump on in the water is fine... pattyinarnold
